■The following things will
decrease the patty quality:
　・When the ingredients are
stored in the grill-side
freezer for too long.
　・When you leave the door
to the grill-side freezer
open.

■The following things will
decrease the patty quality:
　・When the temperature is
not between -23°C/-9°F and
-18°C/0°F

■Discard any raw patties
that have turned brown,
bright red or white.
■Discard patties that are
difficult to separate or
that have too many ice
crystals on them.
